original: Alm, Gustav (Gösta), distriktslantmätare, Växjö, f. 9/10/99 i Söraby, Kronob. I., av fanj. Gustaf A. o. Karin Jolhans’son. G. 1. 25 m. Maja Norberg, d. 37; 2. 39 m. Greta Nifeson. Barn: Inger Elisabeth f. 26, Karl Gösta 28. — Stud:ex. i Lund 19, lantmät:ex. 24, kulturtekn. ex. 28. Lantmät. 24, aman. i lantmät:styr. 30, tf. byråing. 32, tf. distr :lantmät. i Norrtälje 33, tf. distr:-lantmät. i Oskarshamn 33, distr ilant-mät. i Konga distr. av Kronob. 1. sed. 37. Assist, i kulturtekn. v. KTH 32-33. Led. av styr. f. Sv:es lantmät fören. o. av styr. f. distr :lantmät :sekt. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. SHT.
translated: Alm, Gustav (Gösta), district surveyor, Växjö, born October 9, 1899 in Söraby, Kronoberg County, son of Sergeant Gustaf A. and Karin Jolhansson. Married 1st on May 25th to Maja Norberg who passed away in 1937, 2nd marriage in 1939 to Greta Nifeson. Children: Inger Elisabeth born in 1926, Karl Gösta in 1928. He obtained his degree from Lund University in 1919, completed his surveyor training in 1924, and his degree in cultural technology in 1928. He was a district surveyor since 1924, assistant in surveying from 1930, temporary head of the department in Norrtälje in 1933, temporary district surveyor in Oskarshamn in 1933, and district surveyor in Konga district of Kronoberg county from 1937. He was an assistant in cultural technology at KTH from 1932 to 1933. He was a member of the board of the Swedish surveyors' association and the board of the district surveyor section. He was also a member of the Freemasons and the Society for the History of Technology.

memberOf.name: Society for the History of Technology
